text:
[Verse]
Dancing under moonlight
Stars that shine so bright
Feel the rhythm take flight
Lost in the night

[Verse 2]
Heartbeat pumping wild
Just like a little child
Feeling so free and wild
Running for miles

[Chorus]
We keep on moving
Never stop the groove in
Laughing while we're proving
Love in everything

[Verse 3]
Dreams that never fade
Sweet as lemonade
Together when we raid
Life's big parade

[Bridge]
Hold on tight let's fly
Underneath the sky
No need to ask why
Just close your eyes

[Chorus]
We keep on moving
Never stop the groove in
Laughing while we're proving
Love in everything
title: Under the Moonlight
